mapper.select: select refund_no , supporter_name , project_title , reward_title , order_option , r_reason , refund_status from refund r, (select member_name supporter_name , project_title , reward_title , order_option from tb_order join member using (member_no) join project using (project_no) join reward using (reward_no) ) order by refund_no desc

select o.order_no , to_char(o.order_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order_date , sn.member_name supporter_name , to_char(p.project_end_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') project_end_dt , o.order_status , pn.member_name partner_name , p.project_title , rd.reward_title , o.order_option , o.order_count , to_char(rd.reward_price, '999,999,999') reward_price , to_char(o.order_plus, '999,999,999') order_plus , to_char(o.total_price, '999,999,999')total_price , py.card_no , o.bank_name , o.bank_account , r.r_reason , r.refund_status from tb_order o join member sn on(o.member_no = sn.member_no) join project p on(o.project_no = p.project_no) join member pn on(o.project_no = pn.member_no) join reward rd on(o.project_no = rd.project_no) join pay py on(o.order_no = py.order_no) join refund r on(o.order_no = r.order_no) where r.refund_no = #{refundNo}
